analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/42/0xa99788d2043b4c8b48e2ae757cf1e8a8d9238fac.sol:
	Contract Byzbit has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/42/0xa99788d2043b4c8b48e2ae757cf1e8a8d9238fac.sol#357-359)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/42/0xa99788d2043b4c8b48e2ae757cf1e8a8d9238fac.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/42/0xa99788d2043b4c8b48e2ae757cf1e8a8d9238fac.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/42/0xa99788d2043b4c8b48e2ae757cf1e8a8d9238fac.sol#147) is not in mixedCase
